casebody.data:
Patricia A. BANKERT, Individually and in Her Capacity As Personal Representative of Estate of Jonathan W. Bankert, Sr., et al., petitioners,
v.
Norman W. BERNSTEIN, et al. No. 13-568. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 27, 2014.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit denied.
